title: Simulation Education Based on Deliberate Practice for Surgical Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic surgical procedures and anatomical knowledge
context.additional_context: An intermediate-level surgical skills enhancement program for current practitioners, emphasizing real-time feedback and repetitive practice via digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can improve the accuracy of specific surgical techniques (e.g., suturing, tissue resection) by 20% through deliberate practice in a simulation environment
Learners can reduce errors occurring during surgical procedures by 15% through real-time feedback and self-reflection
Learners can enhance crisis management capabilities by at least two levels on a three-tier evaluation scale through team-based scenario training
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
